2.m: And the LORD God commanded the man, saying, 'You may surely eat of every tree of the garden, but of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil you shall not eat, for in the day that you eat of it you shall surely die.' - Genesis 2:16-17 (ESV)

l.a: God formed man from the dust from the ground and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life.

l.q: What were God's commands to man in verses 16 and 17?
l.a: God commanded man to not eat of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, else he will die.

l.q: How did God create the woman?
l.a: God caused a deep sleep to fall upon the man, He took one of his ribs and made it into a woman.

l.q: Why did God create the woman?
l.a: God created the woman because from out of all the animals that He created, there is no helper fit for man.

s.h:
Pleased as man with men to dwell 
 Jesus, our Emmanuel

2.a: Enjoy a cup of warm chocolate or apple cider with someone who lives with you.
